channel.title: Episodes on Gladio Free Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Episodes on Gladio Free Europe

item.title: Les Rallizes Dénudés ft. Zach
item.description: Les Rallizes Dénudés was a pioneer of the psychedelic drone rock sound, but they’re nowhere near as famous as their contemporaries like Boris. Why is that?

item.title: Migration and Memory
item.description: Was King Arthur an Englishman? Did ancient Turks build every civilization in history?

item.title: Inside the Internet ft. Pam
item.description: The Internet is what gives us power. It’s an energy field created by all artificial things. It surrounds us. It penetrates us. It binds humanity together.

item.title: West Beirut ft. Liam
item.description: A young man comes of age in West Beirut as his country descends into civil war

item.title: To Live ft. Cnut
item.description: One family’s struggle to endure civil war, hardship, tragedy, and shadow puppets.

item.title: S1m0ne ft. Pam
item.description: What if we replaced actors with computers? A thought provoking question that we’re still grappling with the answer to 20 years later.

item.title: Beware of the Car
item.description: A insurance agent moonlights as a car thief and steals cars from various crooks to give back to the people.

item.title: Hernán and Aztec Empire ft. Paul Guinan
item.description: Two works of art offering radically different depicitions the dramatic fall of the mightiest empire in the Americas.

item.title: True Detective (season 2)
item.description: True Detective S2 explores the world of LA corruption, money, power, and the sleaze the can buy.

item.title: The Parallax View ft. James
item.description: An ambitious reporter, investigating a senator’s assassination, realizes witnesses to the shooting are systematically dying and discovers a multi-million dollar corporation which serves as a front for the recruitment of political assassins.

item.title: Barbarians
item.description: Barbarians is a German historical drama that tells the story of Arminus, a Germanic Barbarian raised in Rome, and sent back to Germania a Roman soldier

item.title: Wag the Dog
item.description: The night before news of the President’s sex scandal is made public, the White House devises a plan to fake a war with Albania to distract the media, and the American public

item.title: The Wind That Shakes the Barley ft. James
item.description: We’re joined by James to discuss the 2006 film The Wind That Shakes the Barley, and the Irish War of Independence.

item.title: Yegor Letov and the National Bolsheviks
item.description: The Soviet Union, Punk Rock, Communism, KGB repression, Fascism, and more in this episode about Siberian singer and songwriter Yegor Letov
